meanings.sent1: The little ens in the story was a magical creature.
meanings.sent2: Every ens in the forest had its own unique characteristics.
meanings.sent3: The ens decided to take a day off from existing and went on a picnic.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room, making her presence feel like a warm ens.
meanings.sent5: The ens in the legend was said to have the power to grant wishes.

meanings.definition: A thing that exists; an entity.
meanings.sent1: The mysterious ens in the old house intrigued the children.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study various ens in nature to understand their impact.
meanings.sent3: The lost ens turned out to be a forgotten childhood toy.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was like a precious ens that he cherished deeply.
meanings.sent5: The ancient ruins were the only evidence of the ens that once lived there.
